column2: Therefore, considering the submissions of both parties this Court decides to enlarge the
suspect namely Nilupa Prasad Dharmaweera on the following conditions of bail,
Two sureties  to the value of   50000/- each
The suspect to report to the relevant police station on every last Sunday of the month.
The Suspect   is severely warned not to interfere in any  manner  with the victim of the
